fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Budget, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services

eu_initiatives: Transatlantic issues (WTO), Research and Technology (H2020), Aeronautics (EASA, etc.), space (Galileo, Kopernicus, etc.), security (cybersecurity), defence (prepatory action on research, EDIDP), company law (EMIR)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Consultative Forum on EU External Aviation Policy#E03519#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3519#Member#C
membership: Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe (ASD), European Organisation for Security (EOS), Cercle des Délégués Permanents Français (CDPF), Kangaroo Group, European Satellite Operators Association (ESOA), NEREUS, ERSC, Eurospace, AFEP, AMSA2, AVISA, EBIT, BBE
position: Senior Vice President, Head of Europe and NATO Affairs
relevant_communication: Annual event held in Brussels to give an overview of the company's yearly achievement
goals__remit:
European Aeronautic Defence and Space Companie EADS has adopted the name of Airbus Group since 2014.  
 
Airbus Group is a global leader in aerospace, defence and related services. The group includes aircraft/helicopter manufacturers Airbus, Airbus Helicopters, and Airbus Defence & Space, provider of security and defence solutions and builder of space platforms.
